name: Fidup Owl
description: A cute, anthropomorphic owl mascot for the Open Fidup educational project, symbolizing wisdom and innovative learning.
appearance: Soft gray and white feathers, large round eyes, wearing small round glasses, holding a glowing lightbulb in one talon, with a friendly expression and tufted ears. Cartoonish style similar to Bun's logo, with gentle shading and warm colors.
personality: Wise, curious, tech-oriented, and passionate about education.
